author: srimanob
body:
#### PR description:
This PR is to create updated detector geometries with square (T22) and 3D_pixel (T23) trackers with recent subdetectors (D76).

The next step/PR is to clean up obsolete geometries.

#### PR validation:
Test with
> runTheMatrix.py -w upgrade -l 35434.0,35834.0 --wm init

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:
No backport is needed.

- verify that the PR passes the basic test procedure suggested in the [CMSSW PR instructions](https://cms-sw.github.io/PRWorkflow.html)
title: Add new D78,D79 geometries based on D76 with T22,T23
